name: Hollowfang Gorge
description: The trees twist as they lean inward, forming a shrouded path into the gorge. The deeper you go, the quieter it gets — until silence itself feels like a presence. Shadows flit between the trees, and claw marks line the bark. Something waits.

story_actions.story_text: Examine claw marks on a narrow tree trunk. Fresh. Deep.
Follow pawprints that vanish and reappear in unnatural patterns.
Discover an ancient glyph carved into a stone, surrounded by wolf fur.
Attempt to decipher the glyphs. They seem to speak of an old pact — predator and protector alike.
Enter the cave where the Silent Stone waits. The air shimmers.
Touch the Silent Stone. Visions flood your mind — wolves circling, ancient fire, your own reflection staring back from another life.
A pale alpha wolf emerges — it does not attack, but watches. When you step forward, it lowers its head... and then lunges.
After the alpha falls, the gorge stills. A soft wind carries the howl of distant wolves — mournful, but free.
